short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to play white noise to aid with concentration.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension was developed to improve concentration and stress levels by providing quick access to soothing white noise directly in the browser. White noise has been shown to help many individuals improve concentration. White noise is the most effective at blocking distractions because it contains sound across all sound frequencies.
